{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=U10C020 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00EJVUQO6;US; |price= |est_release_date=06/2006 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349;QAMLink, BCM3349KPBG, HK0625 P10, 787488 Y2C; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640BBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632F-UC75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J350,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325MA2;BCM5325A2KQMG, RG0619 P12, 783050; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3419;BROADCOM, BCM3419KML, cP0627 P10, P26TW 05;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=eCos; |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:16:CF |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols= |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |802dot11_protocols= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |oui= }} "E08C005T00", "REV: 02", "19.2167", and a date code of '''0624''' is silkscreened on one particular U10C020's board. ==Images== File:Ubee_U10C020_board_top.jpg|board top File:Ubee_U10C020_BCM3349KPBG_SoC.jpg|BCM3349 SoC File:Ubee_U10C020_BCM5325MA2_FE_Switch.jpg|BCM5325MA2 FE Switch File:Ubee_U10C020_Flash.jpg|Flash File:Ubee_U10C020_RAM.jpg|RAM File:Ubee_U10C020_BCM3419KML.jpg|BCM3419 tuner File:Ubee_U10C020_Foxconn_PN.jpg|Foxconn board PN File:Ubee_U10C020_power.jpg|power section File:Ubee_U10C020_PCBmanuf_text_and_datecode.jpg|PCBmanuf text + date code File:Ubee_U10C020_Foxconn_label.jpg|Foxconn label File:Ubee_U10C020_board_bot.jpg|board bottom {{#set:Has images=internal}} ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
^
|
| USB B-type port

  (GND)
J (RxD)
3 (...)
0 (TxD)
5 (...)
